remarks: Membership of vector subtraction in subgroup sum.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
statement:
lsmelvalm.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
lsmelvalm.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
lsmelvalm.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmelvalm.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
lsmelvalmi.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. T ) $.
lsmelvalmi.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. U ) $.
lsmelvalmi $p |- ( ph -> ( X .- Y ) e. ( T .(+) U ) ) $.
